# R + Microsoft
## Microsoft R Server
- Formerly, Revolution R for Enterprise
- Available on Windows and Linux
- Specialised connectors available for SQL Server, Hadoop, Oracle, & Teradata

## AzureML
- Uses R throughout

## PowerBI
- R as a data source
- Use R for data visualisations
- Any R variant

## SQL Server
- Call R from inside SQL
